====
Hugo
====

.. highlight:: console

Install
=======

::

    wget https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases/download/v0.64.1/hugo_0.64.1_Linux-64bit.tar.gz

or

::

    wget https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases/download/v0.64.1/hugo_extended_0.64.1_Linux-64bit.tar.gz

::

    tar -xvzf hugo_extended_0.64.1_Linux-64bit.tar.gz & /
    sudo mv hugo /usr/local/bin & /
    chown root:root /usr/local/bin/hugo & /
    hugo version
